sword.name: sword
sword.description: a super basic sword that is sturdy and made by a normal black smith

greatsword.name: greatsword
greatsword.description: a large and heavy sword that requires strength to wield effectively

enchanted dagger.name: dagger
enchanted dagger.description: a small, lightweight weapon with a high critical hit chance that doesn't exist

amulet.name: amulet
amulet.description: an accessory that provides heals once a day

hammer.name: hammer
hammer.description: a powerful hammer that deals significant damage but requires strength to use

hand_cannon.name: hand_cannon
hand_cannon.description: a high-damage firearm that requires both strength and intelligence to use effectively

sabre.name: sabre
sabre.description: a light and agile sword that requires both strength and intelligence to use
